price: 17. Mpe esukelaki bango ete: Bango nyoso mibale bakozalaka na moto libela kati na yango. Wana nde ekozala lifuta lia babubi.
arabic: فَكَانَ عَٰقِبَتَهُمَآ أَنَّهُمَا فِي ٱلنَّارِ خَٰلِدَيۡنِ فِيهَاۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَٰٓؤُاْ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fakāna ʿāqibatahumā annahumā fī al-nāri khālidayni fīhā wadhālika jazāu al-ẓālimīna
